alert.note: Alert for Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:19AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Valley County through 345 AM CDT... At 319 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Burwell to near Sargent. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elyria and Fort Hartsuff State Park around 335 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
